title: Summer
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 30L
description: Summer gives the beginning reader a chance to learn the printed vocabulary for all the wonderful things we associate with the season. The sun, the beach, and flowers are all featured with evocative illustrations.
reviewWords: ball, beach, flowers, garden, rain, summer, sunshine, swimsuit
